'''Planks''' are Quest Items that are used in multiple [[World Quest]]s.

World Quests that involve this item include:
*"[[Lantern Rite Tales/Hammer and Wrench|Hammer and Wrench]]" (Event World Quest)
**Two planks are required to help Wrench Wang with his work.
*[[Tatara Tales: Final Preparations]]
**Three planks are required to repair the broken paths.
